channel.title: Android on Gianluca Fiore Personal Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Gianluca Fiore Personal Wiki

item.title: Android
item.description: Performance tweaks Save Battery Increase overall touch responsiveness Raise photo and video recording quality 3G signal tweaks Net Tcp speed tweaks Disable blackscreen issue after call Various Uninstall sytem app Performance tweaks In /system/build.prop edit: ro.~HOME_APP_ADJ=1 to force launcher into memory ro.media.enc.jpeg.quality=100 to raise jpeg quality to 100% dalvik.vm.heapsize=48m specifies the VM heapsize debug.sf.hw=1 to render UI with the GPU ro.telephony.call_ring.delay=0 to decrease dialing out delay windowsmgr.max_events_per_sec=150 help scrolling responsiveness
